name: Runner reader
description:
LUDUM DARE 41 - COMPO submission

Text based endless runner fun!

With two modes of playing, text based (the real deal!) or visual mode on (for practice).

Avoid the dangers of this super challenging text based endless runner with the help of all the infor available.

Controls:
Jump - SpaceBar
Glide (after jump) - Up arrow
Lean forward - right arrow
Lean backwards - left arrow
